page.title: 18CAYTON HOME LIFE SURVEY (2)
page.content: Mr and Mrs "Average Cayton" have a TV, video recorder, washing machine,spin dryer, tumble dryer, refrigerator, deep freeze, central heating and a car but no dishwasher. They listen mainly to the local radio station _ York and prefer "pop" and light music. They take both a daily (or local evening) paper and a Sunday paper. During a year they are more likely not to go the cinema or live theatre than to go. They rarely go to church though Mrs Average is more than 3 times likely to go than her husband. They will have 1 or more pets _ dogs, cats, rabbits, goldfish and guinea pigs being most popular. They are eating more healthily by being just as likely to eat wholemeal bread and drink fat reduced milk.
